prompt: Nestled on a secluded island, a striking modernist villa stands as a testament to avant-garde architectural design. Perched on a gentle slope overlooking the azure waves of the ocean, the villa's angular forms and expansive glass facades embrace minimalism while inviting the surrounding natural beauty into its spaces. The scene is captured from a high vantage point, offering a bird's-eye view that emphasizes the geometric precision of the design, with the villa dominating the center of the frame. The vastness of the ocean stretches beyond, dotted with small sailboats that appear as tiny white specks against the deep blue, accentuating the villa's scale and location. Bathed in the soft, warm light of late afternoon, shadows play across the villa's surfaces, highlighting the textures of its concrete and steel elements. The interplay of light and shadow adds depth and a dynamic quality to the scene, as sunlight filters through the villa's glass walls, casting intricate patterns on its interiors. The color palette is a harmonious blend of cool grays and warm earth tones, balanced by the vibrant blues of the ocean and sky. This thoughtful arrangement of colors evokes a sense of tranquility and modern elegance. Surrounding the villa, lush green gardens and strategically placed sculptures enhance the sense of a curated, serene oasis. In keeping with its modernist style, the villa is captured with sharp clarity and professional precision, ensuring every line and surface is rendered with stunning detail, reflecting the craftsmanship and artistic vision of its creators.

description: The villa features large glass facades and angular modernist design.
Surrounding the villa are lush green gardens and contemporary sculptures.
The villa is positioned on a gentle slope overlooking the ocean.
questions: Is the villa designed in a modernist style?
Are there expansive glass facades on the villa?
Does the villa overlook an ocean?
